title: x/tools/cmd/goimports: doesn't work for Go 1.4 and below
body:
I don't know if this is considered a concern, but https://github.com/golang/tools/commit/edf8e6fef861d8c5ecc9e394b0146d6ebba57795 breaks goimport use on go version < 1.5 because of the absence of the runtime/trace package before 1.5.

/cc @bradfitz
